sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT MNG_YEAR ,FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO ,MNG_SEQ ,ELCTY_EQUIP_NM ,ELCTY_SE ,GAM_GET_ELCTY_SE_NM(ELCTY_SE) AS ELCTY_SE_NM ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(EQUIP_CAPA,0),'9,999,999,990')) AS EQUIP_CAPA ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(CTRT_CAPA,0),'9,999,999,990')) AS CTRT_CAPA ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(USAGE_VOLT,0),'9,999,990')) AS USAGE_VOLT ,REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT FROM ELCTY_EQUIP_CAPA_F WHERE 1=1
AND MNG_YEAR = #sMngYear#
AND ELCTY_SE = #sElctySe#
AND ELCTY_EQUIP_NM LIKE '%' || #sElctyEquipNm# || '%'
ORDER BY MNG_YEAR, ELCTY_EQUIP_NM ) S ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(COUNT(*),'999,999,999,990')) AS DATA_COUNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(EQUIP_CAPA),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_EQUIP_CAPA ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(CTRT_CAPA),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_CTRT_CAPA FROM ELCTY_EQUIP_CAPA_F WHERE 1=1
AND MNG_YEAR = #sMngYear#
AND ELCTY_SE = #sElctySe#
AND ELCTY_EQUIP_NM LIKE '%' || #sElctyEquipNm# || '%'

SELECT MNG_YEAR ,FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO ,MNG_SEQ ,ELCTY_EQUIP_NM ,ELCTY_SE ,GAM_GET_ELCTY_SE_NM(ELCTY_SE) AS ELCTY_SE_NM ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(EQUIP_CAPA,0),'9,999,999,990')) AS EQUIP_CAPA ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(CTRT_CAPA,0),'9,999,999,990')) AS CTRT_CAPA ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(USAGE_VOLT,0),'9,999,990')) AS USAGE_VOLT ,REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT FROM ELCTY_EQUIP_CAPA_F WHERE MNG_YEAR = #mngYear# AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq#

SELECT /*+ INDEX (T1 PK_ELCTY_EQUIP_CAPA_F) */ T1.ELCTY_EQUIP_NM ,NVL(SUM(T1.EQUIP_CAPA),0) AS EQUIP_CAPA ,NVL(SUM(T1.CTRT_CAPA),0) AS CTRT_CAPA ,NVL(SUM(T1.USAGE_VOLT),0) AS USAGE_VOLT ,COUNT(*) OVER () AS DATA_COUNT FROM ELCTY_EQUIP_CAPA_F T1 WHERE T1.MNG_YEAR = #mngYear# GROUP BY T1.ELCTY_EQUIP_NM ORDER BY T1.ELCTY_EQUIP_NM

SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(EQUIP_CAPA,0),'9,999,999,990')) AS EQUIP_CAPA ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(CTRT_CAPA,0),'9,999,999,990')) AS CTRT_CAPA ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(USAGE_VOLT,0),'9,999,990')) AS USAGE_VOLT FROM ELCTY_EQUIP_CAPA_F WHERE MNG_YEAR = TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(#mngYear#) - 1) AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND ELCTY_EQUIP_NM = #elctyEquipNm#
SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(NVL(MAX(MNG_SEQ),'000')) + 1,'000')) FROM ELCTY_EQUIP_CAPA_F WHERE MNG_YEAR = #mngYear# AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo#
SELECT COUNT(*) AS MT_CNT ,TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(#sMngYear#) - 1) AS PREV_YEAR FROM ELCTY_EQUIP_CAPA_F WHERE MNG_YEAR = #sMngYear#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ELCTY_EQUIP_CAPA_F SET ELCTY_EQUIP_NM = #elctyEquipNm# ,ELCTY_SE = #elctySe# ,EQUIP_CAPA = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#equipCapa#,',','')),0) ,CTRT_CAPA = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#ctrtCapa#,',','')),0) ,USAGE_VOLT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#usageVolt#,',','')),0) ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE MNG_YEAR = #mngYear# AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM ELCTY_EQUIP_CAPA_F WHERE MNG_YEAR = #mngYear# AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ELCTY_EQUIP_CAPA_F ( MNG_YEAR ,FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO ,MNG_SEQ ,ELCTY_EQUIP_NM ,ELCTY_SE ,EQUIP_CAPA ,CTRT_CAPA ,USAGE_VOLT ,REG_USR ,REGIST_DT ) SELECT #sMngYear# ,FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO ,MNG_SEQ ,ELCTY_EQUIP_NM ,ELCTY_SE ,EQUIP_CAPA ,CTRT_CAPA ,USAGE_VOLT ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE FROM ELCTY_EQUIP_CAPA_F WHERE MNG_YEAR = TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(#sMngYear#) - 1)
